title: This Week in Tech: New Maap Road Shoes, Alloy Gravel Bikes from Mondraker and Kona, and Strava Gets More AI
content:
Elite's smart trainers add compatibility with Zwift Cog and Click, Coros adds a device repair program, and more this week in tech.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: New Maap Road Shoes, Alloy Gravel Bikes from Mondraker and Kona, and Strava Gets More AI on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
